entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
